name: La Pola fro Guaduas
description:
Guaduas is considered one of the heritage towns of Colombia, this title is given to some towns where relevant historical events have taken place, do not exceed a certain number of inhabitants and maintain their colonial beauty.

If you have seen any of my works, I invite you to review a little about life and events beyond the label given to them as heroes or martyrs in the history of each country, and in this case I present to you a woman who was heroine and martyr, she was very clever when it came to extracting information from the Spaniards in times of Colombian independence, she was surprised and although she was riddled with bullets she was always proud and did not kneel to the tyrannical power and from the scaffold she conjured to follow the fight to defeat Spain, the tyrant of Viceroy Samano, his death so outraged the people of his time that it was an engine to continue the fight since they messed with a woman and not with any woman, hence it remained in our history Like La Pola, she was born in this town and tributes to her are in every corner of her territory, and a monument to her honor is erected in its central square.

Life is what happens while we survive, but for some life is what is worth sacrificing for an idea that gives value to everyone's life.
